name: Tales of Monsterland (Bitmap Soft)
description:
A village besieged by monsters, a mysterious tower and a broken rope bridge.

Save the village by uncovering the origin of these creatures. Run, jump and battle your way through a strange land, gaining powerful abilities to help you in your quest.

It’s non-stop action all the way to the end and then maybe, you can find your way home.

TALES OF MONSTERLAND is a brand new title that hearkens back to the golden age of platforming adventures. Explore an open world, discovering hidden items and areas. · Presented in glorious green scale · Four magical forms to unlock · Find the hidden world! · Suitable for all ages · Featuring battery-less saving! No more lost saves or soldering irons.

Included in the package · A professionally created glossy box · A premium game cartridge with cartridge protector · Full colour manual · Stickers

Credits

Cover illustration, graphics, development/scripting and story – Joel Jarman

Music – Ember/Deer, TearsKrümel (crumb), Rulz

Publishing - Bitmap Soft

Scripting help, plugins, game testing & feedback Dan Enders (Lazy Dev Games), eishiya, KimKong, Matt Winston, Max Oakland, NalaFala (yousurname.itch.io), Robin Tong, RichardULZ, Toxa

+ thanks to Chris Maltby and all of the GB Studio Discord community.

Compatible with the all original Gameboys (DMG, Pocket, Color and Advance/SP).
